author: ralph pitzal
text: 'Great place to hang out with friends. Good food
column5: and good people.'

author: anthony ucciferri
text: 'Ok
column5: so when I moved to Hoboken I thought this was going to be my spot. Soon I realized it wasn‚Äôt what I expected‚Ä¶. I got a noise complaint on the first time I brought a person of color with me
column6: where the owner said ‚Äú there are ‚Ä¶'

author: Meredith Williams
text: 'Classic Irish Pub vibes. Come for the drinks stay for the chill atmosphere. We got the Ghost Hawk and Magnify. Bathrooms a bit......'

author: Jose M. Vargas
text: "Had an awesome beer there
column5: I just don't remember the name of it but I went back on a Monday night and it was closed :(\nbut I am going back to that beer soon."

author: Lauren -
text: "Cool place! Enjoyed the music. Great service at the bar. Just wish it wasn't cash only üòâ"

author: Shelley Hamilton
text: 'Garlic parmesan truffle fries were to die for...really crispy
column5: not soggy.'

author: Jonathan Pepe
text: 'One of the better no frills pubs in town. Has a decent amount of heated outdoor seating. Great tap list and tasty bar food. Epic nachos (come hungry). Super friendly staff. Cash only
column5: so bring ahead and save yourself the ATM fees inside.'

author: VictoriaNB
text: 'Cash only establishment. Both the food and service were excellent and fairly priced. Been there a few times and always had a great experience.'

author: Lisa Crawford
text: "This place was great! Stopped in on a whim. I was hungry and cold lol bartender was wonderful. She answered a bunch of questions for me as I don't live here and didn't know where to go. Manager Anthony (owner maybe? I have no idea) was so ‚Ä¶"

author: Avishay Cohen
text: 'Tasty food. Cold beer. Good place to hang
column5: very generic.'

author: Genessy Mendoza
text: 'Cool environment üòé people are very friendly'

author: John Grun
text: "It's all right. Nice place to grab a quick drink"

author: Dennis Aguilar
text: 'Nice bar. Cute girl with the curly hair.'

author: Riya Antony
text: 'They were king enough to get warm water for my friend even though the kitchen was closed when we arrived. I do not like the taste of alcohol in my cocktails and the bar tender made a special blend for me based on what I said I liked and I was so good. Loved it!!'

author: leah rodgers
text: 'Bar food and the feeling at this location is great. Service is always excellent even when they have a full house. The service here is above par.'

author: marcela ramirez
text: "Services was average the servers had zero attention even when we were just a couple of tables they didn't even tried
column5: I order the Cesar wrap it took about 40 minutes and I got a tiny overpriced wrap
column6: chicken was dry

author: Alexander Kruper
text: 'They have good beer
column5: quick draw
column6: good food
column8: plenty of TVs and did I mention Quick Draw?!'

author: Brent Kottner
text: "Went here specifically to get growler filled. It was $24 for a 64oz growler I brought in. Didn't feel cold on the upper portion of the growler when poured. Bartender assured me it was full. Got home.... There's no beer for about 4 inches from the opening. I paid a lot
column5: and missed out on a lot of beer."

author: Dan Paolillo
text: 'Friendly staff good food
column5: decent list of local beer'

author: Kenny Freeman
text: 'Food
column5: service
column6: and staff are always great. Really good selection of (mostly local) craft beer. Their daily deals are extremely reasonable.'

author: Kristy George
text: 'Great tasting bar food
column5: great bartenders
column6: great service. Quick draw and sports playing.'

author: Angela Miranda
text: 'So
column5: I never really like to waste my time on reviews. But I think this issue needs to be addressed especially during this crazy time we are all living in. My friends and I decided to take a break from quarantine and head to Hoboken for some ‚Ä¶'

author: Chelsea Grogan
text: 'GREAT customer service with fast response time (via Instagram). Fun atmosphere with good deals.'

author: Amol Bhatia
text: "This place is amazing
column5: great food and service. The Bartender is nice and quick
column6: quality 5/5. Beautiful bar and atmosphere. The Events are one of the best parts of the culture; it's fun
column9: and social. It gets pretty crowded and a great place to meet with friends."

author: Hope Hope
text: "Really good food and a cool selection of beers. Super sweet Sunday afternoon bartender. Will return next time we're in the area :)"

author: Dan F
text: "Nice place to go to for a drink. Nothing special about the atmosphere
column5: but there is a darts board and pool table. The bartenders and staff are super friendly and knowledgeable. You wouldn't expect it but they have a very good drink/beer ‚Ä¶"

author: Dave Curran
text: "Best nachos I've had since Brighton Beer Garden (MA) closed.  Great space inside with the giant bar.  Live music some nights.  Will definitely be back"

author: joel alarcon Gonzalez
text: "One of the best places I've been to in NJ. I was visiting from California for a few days. I ended two of my nights at the Tavern. Very welcoming and friendly atmosphere."

author: Sean Glendon
text: 'My only complaint is that this place is cash only. Massive bar. Good music. Fantastic buffalo chicken sandwich. Friendly staff. And I attended during a tap takeover and joined the beer club. Will return soon.'

author: Luker Swift
text: "I've been going to 8th St for years
column5: and I am glad to see that they are finally improving upon what matters most in a bar so close to a university - their craft beer selection!  With unique beers from local microbreweries as well as big ‚Ä¶"

author: Alex Harding
text: "Pretty good
column5: typical bar food. Decent beer selection. A little pricey
column6: but about average for Hoboken. They have lots of TVs
column8: and some games (pool and buck hunter). My main complaint is that they're cash only (though they supply an ATM and they're pretty up front about being cash only)."

author: Wireless Zone Lincroft
text: 'Moving my son to Hoboken so we stopped in for a quick bite and a beer. Service was excellent at the bar and the Spaten on draft was nice. Chicken nachos were very good! We will be back'

author: Donna Talavera
text: 'Fun tavern. Good food'

author: Esteban Gonzalez
text: 'Bartender was rude and did not want to serve me some water on a super hot day. Kept insisting that it is a bar and they sell drinks when I had already drank enough and just wanted some water to cool down. Instead I was forced to buy a bottled water down the street.'

author: Richelle Elliott
text: 'Awsome friendly little bar serving the best bar snacks. Nice and clean great bar staff
column5: love the layout of the bar here ! Allows room for everyone sitting around
column6: very comfortable for a small place love it here'

author: Don Citarella
text: "8th Street Tavern became my default local after Sullivan's and Northern Soul shut down. Initially
column5: I didn't frequent it because it's far from my place
column6: but for a bar that's been here for 32 years
column7: I figured I should give it a try. ‚Ä¶"

author: Andrew Smith
text: 'Good vibe
column5: friendly staff
column6: but terrible nachos and cash only.'

author: Andy M
text: 'Was a great experience. I come here alot. The bartenders are quick to get you your drink and food even when packed. Very friendly
column5: quick to stop a problem before it gets out of hand
column6: and food is amazing.'

author: Ian Panoringan
text: 'Ever felt like you weren‚Äôt wanted at an establishment? Yeah
column5: that‚Äôs how I felt here.'

author: Nikki Bello
text: 'Love this place! Over 85 beers! The food is soooooooooo good! New chef! Try the buttermilk chicken sandwich
column5: pub pies
column6: mac and cheese
column7: steak. Great for crowds of peoples'

author: Louise Austin
text: 'Love it!!  Great beers on tap
column5: cool people
column6: good music.  Went on a Friday night and they were spinning old school 90s/80s.  Love it!!!'

author: Jose ‚ÄúJoe See‚Äù Gomez
text: 'Great beer selection
column5: the setup of the bar is perfect because it is open space. Additionally happy hour prices are perfect.'

author: Eric Williams
text: "Great late night bar in the middle of Hoboken. Far enough uptown from the path frenzy
column5: it makes this place have a local feel. Only downside is the cash only. I was shocked by this and don't see a place thriving without credit cards."

author: Meracesa Brigers
text: "Mouth watering toasty innovative SAMMICHES! ;)\nMy son said he didn't want a sandwich and I ordered up a turkey with swiss on Dutch Crunch and Avacado
column5: the secret sauce and shredded lettuce with fresh veggies ‚Ä¶"

author: Chris Brockway
text: 'Great beer selection and cool place to hang out after a long day and enjoy a cold beer. A pain that they only accept cash...'

author: Dan Atkinson
text: 'The best bar in Hoboken! Expansive and rotating craft beer selection
column5: great bartenders
column6: plenty of TVs
column7: plus some cool events a couple times a month - tap takeovers

author: CP Thangaraja
text: 'Known this place for about a year. Family owned business so they provide great service. Some IPA beers on tap and they have brunch menu on weekends (which is great). Got Pool
column5: dart and jukebox as well. Cash only though (atm inside).'

author: James Gibbons
text: 'Amazing wings'

author: Paige Hoffmann
text: '8th street proves itself over and over. Service is always excellent
column5: prices are just right and the food is awesome. The atmosphere makes it one of my fave places in Hoboken. Anthony is the man. Wish I could give more than 5 stars!'

author: Stephen Napoles
text: 'Cool bar
column5: great jukebox and good pub food. Fun atmosphere'

author: Nick Grosche
text: 'Good place to grab a quiet beer with friends. Not particularly pricey which is nice for the area. Very friendly staff.'

author: Daniel K
text: 'Excellent beer selection.'

author: Sheyla Villeta
text: 'Very nice crowd'

author: Sara Mahanirananda
text: 'I wanted to put 0 stars but it‚Äôs not possible - I have never been here before
column5: but my friends and i stopped by for a quick drink around 9:15pm. The bar is by no means busy. My friend needed some water
column6: so I courteously asked the bartender ‚Ä¶'

author: Maxwell Gorman
text: '"all you can eat wings" is fake
column5: takes 20 min for each round of 6 wings. stolen money.'

author: Avon Morgan
text: 'Great bar. Only downside is their cash only policy.'

author: Chris Rampe
text: 'OMG the food is to die for and they are about to have QUICK DRAW LOTTERY FROM THE NEW JERSEY LOTTERY!!!!!  AWESOME PLACE TO PLAY STARTING JULY 17 2017'

author: Todd Lindquist
text: 'Nice place a unique craft beer bar'

author: Andres Diaz-Borda
text: 'Pretty nice selection of craft bears. Also chilled glasses and proper pouring technic is nice'

author: Thomas Kelly
text: 'Nice cold beer'

author: michelle
text: 'I had fun
column5: good drinks good prices. Pool table. Darts.'

author: Robert Vertullo
text: 'This place checks every box
column5: long accessible bar
column6: good beer list
column10: lots of TVs (bonus points-Scarface was playing on one of them)

author: Leo Papaneophytou
text: "Great for a drink but they recently lost their cook and don't serve food."

author: Kamal Gursahani
text: "Place is ok..good selection of beers. Didn't like the fact that it's cash only and the ATM fee is $5!!"

author: Carena Miles
text: 'Four of my friends and I decided to grab drinks at this place. Upon entering
column5: one of our friend went quickly to get a drink at the bar
column6: while the four of us set away from the bar on some stools by the wall

author: Shane Markstrum
text: 'Good local pub with nice rotating selection of craft
column5: domestic
column6: and imported beers. Also offers a few interesting twists on traditional cocktails.'

author: Daniel Place
text: 'Great choice of craft beers
column5: relaxed environment
column6: friendly bartenders
column7: good food and drink specials especially for sports games.'

author: Zach
text: 'Good place for a beer.'

author: Cassie Vargas
text: 'Great service the bar tenders no how to make more mixed drinks than most other bars in the area'

author: Richard Dicenzo
text: 'Good place to run in a get a couple beers.'

author: Ryan Lynch
text: 'Cash Only
column5: decent atmosphere'

author: Doug Cruickshank
text: "8th Street Tavern was refurbished a few years ago and this was my first visit since then. It's gone from a true old-school ratty local bar to a newer smarter version of its same old self. A local bar that harkens back to an earlier era ‚Ä¶"

author: James N.
text: 'Good canned selection of local brews'

author: Christopher Berkvam
text: 'Bartender was solid
column5: lots of beers available
column6: all in all really chill place.'

author: Andrew Shazam
text: 'Love this place! Anthony is a boss.'

author: Paul Cox III
text: 'Great local casual bar with friendly staff'

author: Nick Zubrycki
text: 'Great beer selection'

author: Carolina Mina Bellani
text: 'Friendly bartender
column5: pool table and dart board
column6: cash only but not an issue with me. They have an atm there.'

author: John Nagle (Blasterman#1362)
text: 'Literally the best bar in Hoboken.'

author: Jen Gill
text: 'Typical Hoboken tavern. Small
column5: but enjoyable.'

author: Gisela Abad
text: "Play the lotto and drink at the same time!!!! Woohoo!! First bar I've ever been to that does that!"

author: Michael Castellon
text: 'Awesome!!'

author: Tiegh Francois
text: 'Nice local sports bar.'

author: Vishwajeet Kakde
text: "Only problem is they never accept plastic money

column6: there's a $3 surcharge per withdrawal."

author: Lisa Hoskins
text: 'Great cocktails!'

author: Carlos Camacho
text: 'Love this spot'

author: Chef Elliot Crespo
text: 'Great beer selection'

author: Rahul Basu
text: 'Good beer!'

text: 'Always a good time'

author: Bree Falato
text: 'Love this place.'

text: 'Fast service'

text: 'Cash only and horrible service'

text: 'Great pub'

text: 'Overpriced and basic'

text: 'Great bar'

text: 'Bartender spent more time on checking my id than replying if they have what I was looking for.'
